original_text: The eighth captain for the eighth month was Sibbecai the Hushathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
korean_text: 여덟째 달 여덟째 지휘관은 세라 족속 후사 사람 십브개이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: The eighth captain for the eighth month was Sibbecai
sentences.korean_translation: 여덟째 달을 위한 여덟째 대장은 십배였으며

sentences.original_text: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 반열에는 이만 사천 명이 있었다.
